page.title: 10Greenfield V.C.Lower School
page.content:
The school was opened 27 years ago. It is a wooden building and was erected as a temporary measure! In September 1985, there were 48 children on roll.
Staff:1 Headteacher, 1 Full-time teacher, 1 Part-time teacher, 1 Part-time General Assistant, 1 Part- time Clerical Assistant, 2 Dinner Supervisors, 1 Kitchen Assistant and 1 Part-time Caretaker.
The old school, built in 1890 is now occupied by Mr.James Butler, a famous sculptor. His latest project was a statue of Field Marshal Earl Alexander which now stands outside Wellington Barracks. It was unvieled by H.M. Queen Elizabeth earlier this year.
